pages.title: Ores
pages.text: Crossroads adds a few ores to world gen. Crossroads also adds several methods for <thing>$(l:essentials:rotary/millstone)ore doubling/$ and a method of <thing>$(l:essentials:rotary/stamp)ore tripling/$.$(br2)

<item>Tin/$ is about as rare as gold, with the same distribution (but without being more common in mesas), spawning scattered as single ore blocks. It can spawn between y=32 and y=-64, being most common around y=-20 and y=-48. For an optional extra challenge, you can keep Crossroads tin separate from other mods' tin, and use only the Crossroads tin for Crossroads machines.$(br2)

<item>Ruby ore/$ only spawns in the nether as single blocks of ore, and spawns in blackrock (not netherrack). It is overall quite rare. It drops <item>ruby/$ gems, which are used for <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$. <item>Rubies/$ can also be sold by piglins.$(br2)

<item>Void ore/$ only spawns in the end on the outer end islands in endstone. It fairly easy to find. It drops <item>void crystals/$, which are used for late game <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$ (specifically creating <thing>$(l:essentials:beam/void)void/$).$(br2)
